mapper.sql: select T.ROW_ID as id, date_format(T.CREATED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as created, T.CREATED_BY as createdBy, date_format(T.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as lastUpdated, T.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy, t.IMG_CODE imgCode, t.TYPE type, t.COMMENTS comments, t.H5_TITLE h5Title, t.H5_TEXT h5Text, t.IMG_NAME imgName, t.IMG_ID imgId
mapper.insert: insert into CX_O_H5_IMG (ROW_ID, IMG_CODE, TYPE,COMMENTS,H5_TITLE,H5_TEXT) values (#{id},#{imgCode},#{type},#{comments},#{h5Title},#{h5Text})
